title: ellAm brahmamayam
sahitya:
ellAm brahmamayam ulagil ellAm brahmamayam


anupallavi

  brahmamayam parabrahmamayam hariharan piraman muruganODarugan


caraNam 1    EkanAthan buddhan shakti sakala matam jAti samayam I erumbum
 vEdiyan paraiyan shelvan Ezhaiyulagil
  caraNam 2    ahankAram krOdam maDamai svayanalam irakkaminmai yAvum
 nirai manidA vETrumai koNDu mei inbamariyAmal tunbam aDaiginrAr
